page.title: 14 COMMUNITY ACTIVITIES
page.content: The Committee of Gt.Staughton's Community Association organises events throughout the year. Early Springtime has seen the assembly of many local intellects - young and old - as the preliminary rounds of "Brains of Staughton" get under way. These are well-supported family occasions when various teams compete for this much coveted title! Annual participation in the Eastern Region's Inter Village Sports gave Gt.Staughton the Championship in 1984. After Feast Week the keen gardeners amongst us prepare for August's Horticultural Show. A Community Bonfire and Firework Display around Nov.5th. marks the start of many other pre-Christmas activities (concerts, parties etc.), not least of all the Staughton Stagers Production.......a Pantomime or Music Hall Variety Show.
